he Hoktant chaka was a prominent chaka within the Shining Lands of southeast Faer√ªn during the mid-to-late 14 century DR and a member of the Chakas of 31.
They were based out of the coastal city of Zabbasz in Estagund.
Seven master traders within the chaka ensured their coffers were always full. The Hoktant chakas wealth came exclusively from trade.
